title: Overnight shooting leaves child injured, police say
content:
KANSAS CITY, Mo. —
Kansas City police said they’re investigating an incident that led to a 5-year-old child being shot overnight.
Police Chief Darryl Forte said the child was shot in the arm near 35th Street and Norton Avenue. Forte said it may have happened during a domestic disturbance.
Investigators have not announced any arrests in the case. They have offered no additional information about the child’s condition.
